name: llm-text-compression-js
description: JavaScript port of LLM text compression pipeline using transformers.js

notes.setup: This is a JavaScript port of the Python LLM compression pipeline.
notes.dependencies: Some dependencies like huffman-coding may need to be installed separately or implemented.
notes.transformers: The @huggingface/transformers.js library is used for LLM inference.
notes.testing: Tests are designed to work even when optional dependencies are missing.
